code: var cartInitState=[];var cartReducer=function cartReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:cartInitState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'CREATE_CART':{return[].concat(action.payload);}case'EDIT_CART':{return state.map(function(cart){if(cart._id===action.payload._id){return Object.assign({},cart,action.payload);}else{return Object.assign({},cart);}});}default:{return[].concat(state);}}};export default cartReducer;
